code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Studios=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[columns,setColumns]=useState([]);const[records,setRecords]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{if(!window.sessionStorage.getItem("auth"))navigate('/unauthorized');fetch('http://localhost:8000/studio/').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setColumns(Object.keys(data.Studios[0]));setRecords(data.Studios);}).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Movie Studios"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:columns.map((c,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:c.replaceAll("_"," ").toUpperCase()},i))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:records.map((record,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:record.studio_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:record.studio})]},i))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"link-btn",onClick:()=>navigate('/newstudioentry'),children:"+Add Studio"})]});};export default Studios;
